page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE 6:6:1985
page.content: LUCINDA JENNER AGED 11 {07.45}Woke up. Breakfast-'Frosties'and milk.Watched'Breakfast Time'. Washed, dressed,cleaned my teeth and got ready to leave for school. {08.30}Said'Goodbye'and went to see my pony before catching the school bus. {08.55}Raining as we all entered school {09.00}Assembly and hymn practise. {09.30}Maths lesson in class. {10.40}Playtime.Played 'Planet Zero'. {11.00}Choral Speaking for concert. {11.30}Swimming lesson with instructor. {12.00}Lunch-sandwiches,biscuit,yoghurt and crisps. Playtime. {13.30}Full Concert practise in hall. {14.30}High jump practise outside. {15.30}Went home on the school coach. {16.30}Changed and went to see my pony. {17.00}Tea.Fish fingers,sweetcorn and new potatoes. Played and watched T.V. {21.00}Washed,went to bed and read.
